name: Flardo's Quest
description:
A vile necromancer lord and his cohorts seek to destroy the island. Who else to save the day but Flardo!

Flardo's Quest is an open ended RPG set in a world of wizards and all things magic. Explore a vast open ended world with areas to explore, dungeons to plunder and many strange characters to meet (But don't forget about the necromancer part... That's kinda important).

*A huge variety of enemies and bosses to slay!
*Obtain ingredients from around the world to discover or make new potions and weapons.
*Did we mention weapons yet? Yeah, there's like a dozen different weapons to obtain.
*Simple hand drawn/pixel art graphics(?)

Flardo's Quest is still in development.
